title: Democratic congressman Ritchie Torres calls Gensler’s SEC ‘arbitrary and capricious’
description:
Democratic House of Representatives member Ritchie Torres criticized the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and advocated for new laws on July 28. Torres told Unchained podcast host Laura Shin: “The modus operandi of the SEC under [Chair] Gary Gensler has been regulation by enforcement … he has taken what I consider to be arbitrary […]

The post Democratic congressman Ritchie Torres calls Gensler’s SEC ‘arbitrary and capricious’ appeared first on CryptoSlate.
